Multi-Head Self-Attention is Computationally Efficient

  • hhhê°œì˜ Attention Headë¥¼ ê³„ì‚°í•˜ë”ë¼ë„ ë¹„ìš© íš¨ìœ¨ì ì„

Scaled Dot Product [Vaswani et al., 2017]

  • Trainingì„ ë•ê¸° ìœ„í•œ "Scaled Dot Product" Attention
  • Dimensionality dddê°€ ì»¤ì§ˆìˆ˜ë¡ Vector ê°„ Dot Productê°€ ì»¤ì§€ëŠ” ê²½í–¥
  • ì´ë¡œ ì¸í•´ Softmax ì…ë ¥ê°’ì´ ì»¤ì ¸ Gradientê°€ ì‘ì•„ì§€ëŠ” ë¬¸ì œ ë°œìƒ
  • Solution
    • ê¸°ì¡´ Self-Attention í•¨ìˆ˜: outputl=softmax(XQlKlTXT)âˆ—XVl\text{output}_l = \text{softmax}(XQ_l K_l^T X^T) * XV_loutputlâ€‹=softmax(XQlâ€‹KlTâ€‹XT)âˆ—XVlâ€‹ ëŒ€ì‹ 
    • Attention Scoreë¥¼ d/h\sqrt{d/h}d/hâ€‹ë¡œ ë‚˜ëˆ„ì–´ ì ìˆ˜ í¬ê¸° ì¡°ì ˆ
      • outputl=softmax(XQlKlTXTd/h)âˆ—XVl\text{output}_l = \text{softmax}(\frac{XQ_l K_l^T X^T}{\sqrt{d/h}}) * XV_loutputlâ€‹=softmax(d/hâ€‹XQlâ€‹KlTâ€‹XTâ€‹)âˆ—XVlâ€‹

Residual Connections [He et al., 2016]

  • Model í•™ìŠµ í–¥ìƒì„ ìœ„í•œ trick
  • X(i)=Layer(X(iâˆ’1))X^{(i)} = Layer(X^{(i-1)})X(i)=Layer(X(iâˆ’1)) ëŒ€ì‹  X(i)=X(iâˆ’1)+Layer(X(iâˆ’1))X^{(i)} = X^{(i-1)} + Layer(X^{(i-1)})X(i)=X(iâˆ’1)+Layer(X(iâˆ’1)) ì‚¬ìš© (ì´ì „ Layerì˜ residualë§Œ í•™ìŠµ)
  • Residual connectionì„ í†µí•œ ì›í™œí•œ gradient íë¦„ (GradientëŠ” 1)

Layer Normalization [Ba et al., 2016]

  • Model í•™ìŠµ ì†ë„ í–¥ìƒì„ ìœ„í•œ trick
  • Idea: ê° layer ë‚´ì—ì„œ unit Meanê³¼ standard deviationìœ¼ë¡œ ì •ê·œí™”í•˜ì—¬ hidden Vector ê°’ì˜ uninformative variation ê°ì†Œ
  • LayerNormì˜ ì„±ê³µ ìš”ì¸ìœ¼ë¡œ ì¶”ì •ë˜ëŠ” gradient normalization [Xu et al., 2019]
  • Details
    • Model ë‚´ ê°œë³„ Vector xâˆˆRdx \in \mathbb{R}^dxâˆˆRd
    • Mean Î¼=1dâˆ‘j=1dxj\mu = \frac{1}{d} \sum_{j=1}^d x_jÎ¼=d1â€‹âˆ‘j=1dâ€‹xjâ€‹
    • Standard Deviation Ïƒ=1dâˆ‘j=1d(xjâˆ’Î¼)2\sigma = \sqrt{\frac{1}{d} \sum_{j=1}^d (x_j - \mu)^2}Ïƒ=d1â€‹âˆ‘j=1dâ€‹(xjâ€‹âˆ’Î¼)2â€‹
    • í•™ìŠµ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ gain ë° Bias Parameter Î³,Î²âˆˆRd\gamma, \beta \in \mathbb{R}^dÎ³,Î²âˆˆRd (ìƒëµ ê°€ëŠ¥)
    • Layer Normalization ê³„ì‚°: Output = xâˆ’Î¼Ïƒâ‹…Î³+Î²\frac{x - \mu}{\sigma} \cdot \gamma + \betaÏƒxâˆ’Î¼â€‹â‹…Î³+Î²

  • Keys, Queries, Valuesê°€ ë™ì¼ ì¶œì²˜ì¸ Self-Attentionê³¼ ë‹¤ë¦„
